SELECT C.* FROM ( SELECT ALL_LIST.* , rownum rn FROM ( SELECT A.JOB_EXECUTION_ID , A.JOB_INSTANCE_ID , B.JOB_NAME , A.VERSION , TO_CHAR(A.CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREATE_TIME , TO_CHAR(A.START_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS START_TIME , TO_CHAR(A.END_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS END_TM , A.STATUS AS STTUS , A.EXIT_CODE , A.EXIT_MESSAGE , TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDATED,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM BATCH_JOB_EXECUTION A , BATCH_JOB_INSTANCE B WHERE A.STATUS = 'STARTED' AND A.JOB_INSTANCE_ID = B.JOB_INSTANCE_ID
B.JOB_NAME LIKE ('%'||#searchKeyword#||'%')
A.JOB_INSTANCE_ID LIKE ('%'||#searchKeyword#||'%')
ORDER BY A.START_TIME DESC
) ALL_LIST ) C WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT D.* FROM ( SELECT ALL_LIST.* , rownum rn FROM ( SELECT A.JOB_EXECUTION_ID , A.JOB_INSTANCE_ID , C.JOB_NAME , A.VERSION , TO_CHAR(A.CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREATE_TIME , TO_CHAR(A.START_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS START_TIME , TO_CHAR(A.END_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS END_TM , A.STATUS AS STTUS , A.EXIT_CODE , A.EXIT_MESSAGE , TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDATED,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM BATCH_JOB_EXECUTION A , BATCH_JOB_INSTANCE C WHERE A.EXIT_CODE IN ('FAILED','STOPPED') AND A.JOB_EXECUTION_ID IN (SELECT B.JOB_EXECUTION_ID FROM BATCH_JOB_EXECUTION B WHERE B.JOB_INSTANCE_ID = A.JOB_INSTANCE_ID AND B.JOB_EXECUTION_ID = (SELECT MAX(JOB_EXECUTION_ID) FROM BATCH_JOB_EXECUTION WHERE JOB_INSTANCE_ID = B.JOB_INSTANCE_ID) AND B.EXIT_CODE <> 'COMPLETED') AND A.JOB_INSTANCE_ID = C.JOB_INSTANCE_ID
C.JOB_NAME LIKE ('%'||#searchKeyword#||'%')
A.JOB_INSTANCE_ID LIKE ('%'||#searchKeyword#||'%')
A.START_TIME >= TO_DATE(#startTime#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.START_TIME < TO_DATE(#startTime#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
ORDER BY LAST_UPDT_PNTTM DESC
) ALL_LIST ) D WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#
